Text:
since i install this pack and his update ,i've got this error when UT2:
Programm error, error loading aircraft assignments.
Invalidargument=The value 0 is not available for 'selectedindex'
Name of parameter: selectedindex.

What does that mean?

Thx
Hi Romgun, great job!!!! A couple of questions though. 1 I get the same error message as mentioned above. 2 What changes are included in this update?
any chance to change the traffic at VHHX to VHHH? Thnaks
Any chance to change the traffic at VHHX to VHHH? Thanks, Also im having the same problem as above

1. Install "FSX Alternative Traffic Pack for the Flight1 Ultimate Traffic" from here 
2. Ignore the error. Close the program UT2
2. Install this update with option "Check UT2Settings.cfg"
3. After this UT2 will start automatically.
Do u have error ?

Hi Romgun,

Well i try to re install this update, i think the first time i don't choose correctly fsx path when your programm asked to do.
It's ok now with no error about UT2 start.
Thanks
Im still having the same problem, even tried reinstalling everything.
Romgun, did you fix the landing touchdown zone with this update?

I'll wait to download this until someone confirms it's working and that the problem mentioned above is fixed. Keep working at it though, Romgun, once perfected these extra tweaks and added realism will become a necessity for any and every flight simmer.

Not to sound like an asshole but can we start uploading more stuff. lately the rate new stuff is being added is slower then a snail fuck, and the stuff that is uploaded is crap. there are a ton of FSX add on's out there so please can we get some new stuff up. damn!
Yes, this update fix landing touchdown zone.

@ snapshot88:
Why don't you buy some, upload them and stop complaining, stupid dumbfuck
Thanks a lot for fixing the landing TDZ

Romgun:
Don't know how you did it, basically I don't care. Lol.
It just works. Now them planes actually touch down where they are supposed to: on the runway.

Went to 5 different airports (three 3rd party and 2 default) and my FSX world is at piece again.

Outstanding work, mate! I shake your hand.

cheers ;0

Romgun
